key.name: numeric
key.description: Numeric level % along with level bar.

key.name: horizontal
key.description: The percentage of the screen width (from the center of the screen) at which the OSD will be displayed.

key.name: vertical
key.description: The percentage of the screen height (from the center of the screen) at which the OSD will be displayed.

key.name: delay
key.description: How long the OSD will be displayed.

key.name: bgcolor2
key.description: Gradient end color of OSD background.

key.name: background-image
key.description: Custom Background Image Effect of OSD.

key.name: ring-gap
key.description: Progress ring gap from border of OSD.

key.name: bradius
key.description: Convert between rectangle and pill shapes.

key.name: square-circle
key.summary: Set shape to square or circle
key.description: Set shape to square or circle with height eq to width.

key.name: monitors
key.description: Monitors to show OSD display on.

key.name: active-profile
key.description: Settings Profile currently applied to all OSDs.
